info.name: bol.com retailer API v3.0 public
info.description:
Example collection for retailer API v3.0.
More information can be found at https://developers.bol.com/

item.name: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN

request.description: Retrieves all commissions and reductions per single EAN.

item.name: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN in bulk

request.description: Retrieves all commissions and reductions by EAN in a bulk overview.
Retrieves all invoices.
Retrieves a single invoice by invoice id.

item.name: Get invoice specification by invoice id

request.description: Retrives the specification of an invoice by invoice id.
Retrieves the data of a single offer.
Deletes a single offer.
Creates a single offer.
Updates a single offer in its entirety.
Updates solely the stock for a single order.
Updates solely the price for a single offer.
Retrieves all reductions.
Retrieves the filename of the file containing the latest reductions.
Retrieves all open orders.
Retrieves a single order based on order id.
Ship a single order item within an order.
Cancels a single order item within an order.
Retrieves the process status of a single process.

item.name: Get process statuses by entity id and event type

request.description: Retrieves all the process statuses per entity and event type.
Retrieves the shipping labels that can be purchased for this order item id.
Retrieves all your shipments that have occured

item.name: Get single shipment by shipment id

request.description: Retrieves the details of a single shipment.
Retrives the shipping label in case you purchased a shipping label from bol.com.
Updates a transport.
Retrieves the available delivery windows.
Retrieves all transporters that can ship FBB (lvb) items.
Get all inbound shipments.

item.name: Get single inbound by inbound id

request.description: Get single inbound shipment by inbound id.
Retrieve lvb inventory that is present in our warehouses.
Create a shipment for sending FBB (lvb) stock to one of our warehouses.
Retrieve the product labels (bSKU's) per ean.
Retrieve the packing list belonging to the inbound.

item.name: Get shipping label by inbound id

request.description: Retrieve the shipping label belonging to the inbound.
Get all returns.
Retrieve the details of a single return.
Handle a single return.
Retrieves the access token for accessing the endpoints.
